items.headline: Why shares of UnitedHealth, Humana and others are tanking and taking the Dow with it
items.summary_en: The shares of UnitedHealth, Humana and other health insurers were clobbered on Tuesday after a preliminary payment proposal for Medicare Advantage fell way short of analyst expectations.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I feel like this does us a disservice’: My brother wants his $1 million inheritance in advance. Should he pay interest?
items.summary_en: “The total value of our family trust is $4 million.”

items.headline: Puma stock climbs as Chinese sports company swoops in for big stake
items.summary_en: China’s Anta Sports paid a big premium but doesn’t appear likely to launch bid for all of Puma.

items.headline: Investors may be led into a trap as stock market discards new tariff threats, analyst warns
items.summary_en: The U.S. stock market’s resiliency will be tested this week by quarterly earnings results, after rebounding from recent bouts of volatility this month on tariff-related fears.

items.headline: The hottest stock market is only briefly rattled by Trump’s threat of 25% tariffs
items.summary_en: South Korean automaker and pharmaceutical stocks eased after President Donald Trump late Monday threatened to raise tariffs on some Korean imports to 25% because that country’s government has been too slow to approve a trade deal reached last year.

items.headline: CoreWeave’s stock soars. Why Nvidia’s fresh bet on the company is so significant.
items.summary_en: Nvidia and CoreWeave are deepening their relationship in a way that could give the cloud company an edge over rivals.

items.headline: ‘I‘m facing an ethical dilemma’: My widowed mother is cutting my step siblings out of the family trust. Do I have a responsibility?
